Sentencas: The coupling of renewable energy sources with reversible operated high temperature solid oxide cells (rSOC) seems to be a promising option to store and supply clean energy in the future.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: This work provides the results of experimental investigations on the performance of a rSOC stack as a main unit of a large-scale module installed at a real industrial power plant.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: In order to determine the requirements as well as to propose strategies for safe and stable operation of the large-scale module the stack was tested under system relevant gas mixtures and operational conditions.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: Hereby, the focus was on steam electrolysis (EC) and fuel cell (FC) operation utilizing a H-2/H2O/CO/CO2/N-2 gas mixture, predefined by the reformer installed within the module at the power plant.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: Furthermore, the alternating operation between EC and FC mode was analyzed.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: The comprehensive analysis of the performance of the stack includes polarization curves, electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS), distribution of relaxation times (DRT), gas analysis and temperature measurements.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: Thus, numerous combinations of operational parameters are linked to the individual processes within the stack.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: During EC operation higher hydrogen partial pressures presented significantly lower diffusion losses especially at low current densities, whereby in FC mode low fuel flows presented increased concentration losses.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: During alternating operation, prolonged voltage stabilization periods with increasing operation time were observed.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant

Sentencas: Additionally, the processes represented by the peaks calculated from the DRT showed enhanced unstable behavior and presented a significant shift towards higher frequencies compared to constant mode operation.
Titulo: Performance assessment and evaluation of SOC stacks designed for application in a reversible operated 150 kW rSOC power plant
